text: The Khuman dynasty () is one of the seven ruling clan dynasties in Ancient Manipur (Antique Kangleipak). It was subjugated under the Ningthouja dynasty in the end of the 14th century AD. The theory of the formation of the Khuman dynasty has both historic as well as mythical aspects. It was one of the three most powerful dynasties, the others being Ningthouja dynasty (Mangang dynasty) and Luwang dynasty. == Related pages == * Mangang Luwang Khuman * Luwang dynasty == References == Category:People from Manipur Category:Indian families Category:History of Manipur
title: Khuman dynasty
